Welcome to Centriole Distancing’s documentation!¶

Contents:

file_io This module contains scripts for file input/output manipulation.
image_fn This module contains scripts for image manipulation including denoising, enhancement and cropping functions
training This module contains functions to aid in parsing of manual dot annotations for centriole distancing and functions to prepare the data for CNN training.
models This module contains functions to aid in the building of the CNN architecture used by us in the paper
distancing This module contains functions that act on the output images of the trained CNN to carry out centriole distancing.
visualization This module contains scripts for visualising detections.
